title: His Highness, the Ruined, is Coming After Me…!! - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Aristocracy   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Marriage   Mob Protagonist   R-15   Royalty
author: Okadachi Ema   岡達 英茉
description:
My country’s fourth prince has apparently fallen in love with me at first sight. His Highness said so himself, with a calm and expressionless face. I love you so much that I can’t even sleep at night.

That can’t be. Love at first sight? I know of no such thing. No, no, no.

For some reason, this prince suddenly came at me with a marriage proposal.

I’m a freeloader living with the Viscount’s family, now married to a prince because of some dubious, ulterior motive. This is the awkward story of the love cultivating between me and the prince.>
